maze
Class Grid

java.lang.Object
  maze.Grid

public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object

This class creates a grid representing a maze and determines the best route through it.

Method Detail

encode

public java.lang.String encode()
Encodes the maze as a String. A Grid is encoded as a string in the following manner: 1) Each space is transcribed from left to right, then top to bottom. 2) Each column is separated by ',' 3) Each row is separated by '\n' 4) Each space type is represented as follows: Path = 'p' Wall = 'w' StartPoint = 's' EndPoint = 'e' 5) The first line of the encoding will display the xLength 6) The second line of the encoding will display the yLength;

Returns:
the encoded String representing the maze.

solve

public void solve()
           throws Grid.InvalidMazeException
Finds the shortest route from start to finish.

Throws:
Grid.InvalidMazeException

getRoute

public java.util.Stack<Path> getRoute()
Provides the route taken to reach the EndPoint

Returns:
Stack\<\Path\> representing the route taken.
